Title: Chasing Amy
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Matt Lawton, David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Amy disappears just before the Sergeant exam.
